text: "All-American Girl" is a song by American singer Carrie Underwood from her second studio album, Carnival Ride (2007). ==Music video== The music video for "All-American Girl" was directed by Roman White. It premiered on CMT on January 31, 2008. The video debuted at number 9 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of February 7, 2008. The video peaked at number 1 on CMT's Top Twenty Countdown for nine consecutive weeks. ==References== Category:2007 songs Category:Carrie Underwood songs
title: All-American Girl (song)
